llc.processing_time: Standard: 10-15 business days, Expedited: Same day, 24-hour, or 2-hour service available for additional fees
llc.annual_filing: Annual Franchise Tax Report - Due by June 1

corporation.processing_time: Standard: 10-15 business days, Expedited: Same day, 24-hour, or 2-hour service available for additional fees
corporation.annual_filing: Annual Franchise Tax Report - Due by March 1
corporation.annual_fee: Minimum $175 annual franchise tax based on authorized shares

partnership.processing_time: Standard: 10-15 business days, Expedited: Same day, 24-hour, or 2-hour service available for additional fees
partnership.annual_filing: Annual Franchise Tax Report - Due by June 1

registered_agent.description: All entities must designate a registered agent with a physical Delaware address.

business_license.description: State business license required for all businesses operating in Delaware.

ein.description: Federal Employer Identification Number required for all entities except sole proprietorships with no employees.

delaware_withholding.description: Registration for withholding required if hiring employees.

entity_name.description: The official name of your business entity.
entity_name.tips: Must include required designation (LLC, Inc., etc.). Check availability on DE Division of Corporations website before filing.

business_purpose.description: Statement of what the business will do.
business_purpose.tips: Can be general (e.g., 'any lawful act or activity for which corporations may be organized').

registered_agent.description: Person or entity designated to receive legal documents.
registered_agent.tips: Must have a physical DE address. Most businesses use a registered agent service since they don't have a physical presence in Delaware.

authorized_shares.description: For corporations, the number of shares the company is authorized to issue.
authorized_shares.tips: Affects annual franchise tax. Consider using the minimum (1,500 for minimum tax) unless you have specific capitalization needs.

par_value.description: The nominal or face value of a share.
par_value.tips: Can be any value or 'no par'. Lower par values often result in lower franchise taxes.
